title.en: If I Could Meet You Again... The Sweet Possessiveness of a (Secretly) Obsessive Guy

altTitles.ja: もう一度会えたらキミと… （隠れ）執着系男子の甘い独占欲

altTitles.ja-ro: Mouichido Aetara Kimi to... (Kakure) Shuuchakukei Danshi no Amai Dokusenyoku

description.en:
**I've wanted to touch you since that day...**

 Although they've just reunited, why does he treat me so gently—with those long, delicate fingers and his sweet, whispered words? Even though I was so cruel to him back then... Ryo rushes to the hospital after hearing her mother was injured, only to find that her primary doctor is none other than her former classmate and junior, Yaya Kitamura. To her surprise, while her family's bento shop is temporarily closed, she ends up working as a housekeeper at Yaya’s busy home. Though Ryo has always been uncomfortable around men, Yaya is the one person she’s able to trust. Yet before she knows it, she finds him lying beside her in bed?!

A story of an **unrequited love-stricken doctor** and a *girl uneasy around men,* rekindling the unforgettable love of their youth, like rediscovering a forgotten flower petal hidden in the pages of an old book.
description.ja:
「あの時からずっと触れたかった」
再会したばかりなのに、繊細に触れる長い指先も、
囁かれる甘い言葉もどうして私に優しいの…？
私は、あんなにひどいことをしたのにーー…。

母親がケガをしたと聞いて急いで病院に向かう玲。
主治医はなんと学生時代の後輩・北村椰々だった。
さらに驚くことに実家のお弁当屋が休業の間、
忙しく働いている椰々の家で家政婦をすることに!?

男性が少し苦手な玲が、唯一心を許せる相手だとは思っていたけれど、
なぜか気づけばベッドを横で椰々が寝ていて!?!?

【片想いこじらせ医者】×【異性が苦手女子】
本の隙間に挟んだまま、忘れてしまった花びらを見つけたように、
今もう一度始まる、忘れられない青春時代の恋。
